text.section: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall be an individual who meets the requirements of this section.
An applicant shall have been graduated on completion of a 4-year curriculum in forestry from a college or university that is approved by the Board or accredited by the Society of American Foresters.
The applicant shall have at least 2 years of experience in forestry that indicates to the Board that the applicant is competent to practice forestry.
